name: Aws CloudWatch Metrics
description: Monitor AWS CloudWatch metrics: this script retrieves information about CPUUtilization, NetworkIn, NetworkOut, DiskReadOps, DiskWriteOps, DatabaseConnections, and many more. For a full list of metrics supported by AWS CloudWatch, please see here https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/monitoring/aws-services-cloudwatch-metrics.html
